'''Mallow Wood "Viewing Rites" Chair''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Mallow Wood "Viewing Rites" Chair is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=160}}.
